headline: Freeport-McMoRan Stock Today: This Long-Term Butterfly Spread Trade Could Net $1,253
summary: With a long call butterfly spread play in Freeport-McMoRan stock, if the stock moves up dramatically, we capture a very tidy profit.

headline: Is Freeport-McMoRan's US-Based Footprint An Advantage? Analyst Upgrades Stock Amid Copper Import Tariff Risk
summary: On Thursday, J.P. Morgan analyst Bill Peterson upgraded Freeport-McMoRan, Inc. (NYSE:FCX) to an Overweight rating from Neutral and raised the price forecast to $52 from $48. The bullish stance reflects the analyst’s view that tariff-related factors will sustain premium pricing for the company’s U.S.-based operations, alongside long-term supply constraints that support a strong pricing environment across the industry.
